exp.title: Developer
points: Designed and implemented a custom AI chatbot within AEM, integrating with an external API to process user queries and dynamically display structured responses
Developed responsive and accessible UIs using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, while handling backend logic through Java and OSGi services
Contributed to the migration of a high-traffic enterprise site to AEM, integrating systems such as Coveo Search, Adobe Journey Optimizer, GTM, and Qualtrics
Configured Adobe Target for beta rollout and GA4/GTM tracking to monitor user engagement and interaction analytics
Delivered custom AEM components for a large-scale retail platform launch, including a dynamic interactive mall map integrated with live API data using OSGi services and configurations
Developed a configurable Google Maps locator component with customizable options and responsive UI aligned to brand design guidelines
Implemented backend logic through modular Sling Models (Java) focused on scalability, maintainability, and test coverage
Created automated test suites to improve deployment reliability and reduce regression testing effort
Participated in an AEM Forms migration project, working across both frontend (HTML, SCSS, JS) and backend (Java, Sling, OSGi) development, including validation and QA testing

exp.title: Intern Developer
points: Developed a Proof-of-Concept Emergency Dashboard in AEM to visualize real-time operational alerts during emergency events
Built the dashboard interface using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, and implemented backend logic with Java Sling Models
Supported Adobe Journey Optimizer (AJO) and Adobe Data Collection initiatives by assisting with schema design and data configuration for analytics and personalization

proj.title: Go Bear AI Job Search
points: Developed a full-stack AI job search platform integrating LLM-based personalization for job recommendations and automated CV/Cover letter customization
Collaborated with a small team to design APIs, user flows, and data pipelines using React and FastAPI

edu.degree: Bachelor of Science majoring in Computer Science
